title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 10
description: Reading Chapter 10, how did Phaedrus start chasing the ghost? His Early years in college - a prodigy, influence of Einstein, and a catastrophic discovery. Plus, one of the more famous quotes in the book.
